details.purpose: *To record summary information about the individual's pattern of substance use.(en)
details.use:
*Use to record summary information about the individual's pattern of substance use.
This archetype is to be used to record information about both current and previous substance use behaviour.
The specific scope of this archetype is on documentation about the use of all types of addictive substances, except tobacco and alcohol. The "Specific substance" cluster allows for recording of specific details, routes and episodes about each type of substance used and can be repeated once per substance.
In some situations the individual will only consume one type of alcoholic beverage, such as beer. If other substances are used, the details will be recorded in another instance of the 'Specific substance' cluster.
The history of waxing and waning of use for each substance over time can be captured using the repeatable 'Per episode' cluster. This cluster of data elements allows for a very detailed pattern of substance use behaviour to be recorded for each type of substance used such as daily cannabis smoking, alongside MDMA use every Friday night and occasional cocaine use.
Triggers for closing one episode and commencing a new one will largely reflect local data collection preferences, including if the individual: - quits for a significant period of time (which will likely be locally defined); or - significantly changes their amount of use or pattern of their substance use.
Use to incorporate the narrative descriptions of substance use habits within existing or legacy clinical systems into an archetyped format, using the 'Overall description' data element.(en)
details.misuse:
*Not to be used to record information about tobacco use - use EVALUATION.tobacco_smoking_summary or EVALUATION.smokeless_tobacco_summary for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about alcohol use - use EVALUATION.alcohol_use_summary for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about the use of addictive substances as part of a normal diet, such as sugar, or caffeine in coffee or tea.
Not to be used to record event-or period-based information about substance use, such as actual daily use or the average use over a specified period of time - use the OBSERVATION.substance_use archetype.(en)

details.purpose: To record summary information about the individual's pattern of substance use.
details.use:
Use to record summary information about the individual's pattern of substance use.
This archetype is to be used to record information about both current and previous substance use behaviour.
The specific scope of this archetype is on documentation about the use of all types of addictive substances, except tobacco and alcohol. The "Specific substance" cluster allows for recording of specific details, routes and episodes about each type of substance used and can be repeated once per substance.
In some situations the individual will only consume one type of alcoholic beverage, such as beer. If other substances are used, the details will be recorded in another instance of the 'Specific substance' cluster.
The history of waxing and waning of use for each substance over time can be captured using the repeatable 'Per episode' cluster. This cluster of data elements allows for a very detailed pattern of substance use behaviour to be recorded for each type of substance used such as daily cannabis smoking, alongside MDMA use every Friday night and occasional cocaine use.
Triggers for closing one episode and commencing a new one will largely reflect local data collection preferences, including if the individual: - quits for a significant period of time (which will likely be locally defined); or - significantly changes their amount of use or pattern of their substance use.
Use to incorporate the narrative descriptions of substance use habits within existing or legacy clinical systems into an archetyped format, using the 'Overall description' data element.
details.misuse:
Not to be used to record information about tobacco use - use EVALUATION.tobacco_smoking_summary or EVALUATION.smokeless_tobacco_summary for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about alcohol use - use EVALUATION.alcohol_use_summary for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about the use of addictive substances as part of a normal diet, such as sugar, or caffeine in coffee or tea.
Not to be used to record event-or period-based information about substance use, such as actual daily use or the average use over a specified period of time - use the OBSERVATION.substance_use archetype.

items.items: Summary or persistent information about an individual's addictive substances use.
Statement about current substance use behaviour for all addictive substances.
Statement about injection use behaviour for any addictive substances.
Narrative summary about the individual's overall substance use pattern and history.

Use this data element to record a narrative description only where the structured data does not adequately reflect the substance use habits for this individual or to incorporate unstructured substance use information from existing or legacy clinical systems into an archetyped format.
Details about use of a specific addictive substance.
The specific substance or substance group used.
Statement about current use behaviour for the specific substance.
Narrative summary about use behaviour for the specified type of substance.
Date or partial date when the individual first used the specified substance.
Can be a partial date, for example, only a year.
The date or partial date when the individual first started frequent or regular, but usually non-daily, use of the substance.
Can be a partial date, for example, only a year. For example, this date could represent when the individual commenced smoking cannabis every Friday night or at parties.
The date or partial date when the individual first started daily use of the substance.
Can be a partial date, for example, only a year.
Details about the use of the specified substance through a specific route of administration.
Details about whether the specified Substance/substance group is used in combination with other substances or substance groups.
The typical pattern of use of the specified substance.
The frequency of use of the specified substance.
Statement about current use of the specified substance through the specified route.
Narrative summary about use behaviour for the specified type of substance through the specified route.
Details about a discrete period of consumption for the specified type of substance through the specified route.
The date or partial date the individual quit using the specified substance through the specified route.
Additional narrative about use of the specified subtance, not captured in other fields.
Identification of an episode of substance use - either as a number in a sequence and/or a named event.
For example: '2' as the second episode within a sequence of episodes; or 'Pregnancy with twins' if describing the substance use during a health event such as during a specific pregnancy.
Can be a partial date, for example, only a year.
Can be a partial date, for example, only a year. This data field will be empty if the episode is current and ongoing.
The effects of the substance on the individual during the specified episode.
Estimate of the amount of the specified substance.
The form of the substance used.
The date or partial date when the individual first used any addictive substance via injection.
Total number of times the individual has attempted to stop using the specified substance within this episode.
Further details about the specific episode.
Additional structured details about the use of the specified substance.
The individual has never used any addictive substances.
The individual is currently using addictive substances.
The individual has previously used any addictive substances but is not a current user.
The individual has never injected any addictive substances.
The individual is current injecting any addictive substances.
The individual has previously injected any addictive substances.
The individual has never used the specific substance.
The individual is currently using the specific substance.
The individual has previously used the specific substance but is not a current user.
The individual has never used the specified route.
The individual is currently using the specified route.
The individual has previously used the specified route but is not using it currently.
Anamnese og persistent informasjon om bruksmønsteret av rusmidler et individ har og har hatt.
*Statement about current substance use behaviour for all addictive substances.(en)
*Statement about injection use behaviour for any addictive substances.(en)
*Narrative summary about the individual's overall substance use pattern and history.(en)

*The specific substance or substance group used.(en)

*The date or partial date when the individual first started daily use of the substance.(en)
*Details about the use of the specified substance through a specific route of administration.(en)
*Details about whether the specified Substance/substance group is used in combination with other substances or substance groups.(en)

*The individual has previously injected any addictive substances.(en)
*The individual has never used the specific substance.(en)
*The individual is currently using the specific substance.(en)
*The individual has previously used the specific substance but is not a current user.(en)
*The individual has never used the specified route.(en)
*The individual is currently using the specified route.(en)
*The individual has previously used the specified route but is not using it currently.(en)
